unitTests.description: JWT verification function needs edge case testing
unitTests.reproductionSteps: 1. Call verifyToken with malformed JWT, expired token, invalid signature
unitTests.observedOutput: Function exists but edge case behavior unknown
unitTests.expectedOutput: Should handle malformed, expired, and invalid tokens gracefully

Unexpected HTTP status code: Public endpoint /scholarships should be accessible

securityTests.expectedOutput: Avoid eval() - use JSON.parse() or other safe alternatives
Secrets should be stored in environment variables
Avoid eval() - use JSON.parse() or other safe alternatives

securityTests.description: Potential SQL injection vulnerability with template literals
securityTests.reproductionSteps: 1. Search for template literals with req. parameters in SQL queries
securityTests.observedOutput: Found template literal with request parameter in DB query
securityTests.expectedOutput: Use parameterized queries or proper escaping

edgeCaseTests.description: Unexpected HTTP status code: Should handle excessively large input data
edgeCaseTests.reproductionSteps: 1. Send POST request to /api/profile with data: {"firstName":"","lastName":"","email":"test@example.com"}

edgeCaseTests.description: Unexpected HTTP status code: Should handle maximum integer values
Unexpected HTTP status code: Should reject negative values for limit parameter

configurationTests.expectedOutput: Should have .env file with required environment variables

databaseTests.description: Database operations may need transaction support
databaseTests.reproductionSteps: 1. Review storage.ts for database modifications without transactions
databaseTests.observedOutput: Found insert/update/delete operations without transaction handling
databaseTests.expectedOutput: Complex operations should use database transactions for consistency

databaseTests.description: Potential SQL injection vulnerability in database queries
databaseTests.reproductionSteps: 1. Search storage.ts for template literals in where clauses
databaseTests.observedOutput: Found template literal usage in database where conditions
databaseTests.expectedOutput: Use parameterized queries with Drizzle ORM methods

businessLogicTests.description: Missing error handling in async functions
businessLogicTests.reproductionSteps: 1. Review server/billing.ts for async functions without try-catch
businessLogicTests.observedOutput: Found 10 async functions with 0 try blocks
businessLogicTests.expectedOutput: All async functions should have proper error handling

businessLogicTests.description: Missing error handling in async functions
businessLogicTests.reproductionSteps: 1. Review server/storage.ts for async functions without try-catch
businessLogicTests.observedOutput: Found 23 async functions with 0 try blocks
businessLogicTests.expectedOutput: All async functions should have proper error handling

performanceTests.description: Rate limiter using default memory store
performanceTests.reproductionSteps: 1. Check rate limiting configuration in server/index.ts
performanceTests.observedOutput: Using default memory store for rate limiting
performanceTests.expectedOutput: Consider Redis or database store for production rate limiting
